mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `merchart_amount_detail` ( `mer_no`, `dateallstr`, `yearint`, `monthint`, `dateint`, `type`, `actual_amount`, business_id, `create_time` ) SELECT t.mer_no, t.input_time AS dateallStr, LEFT (t.input_time, 4), SUBSTR(t.input_time, 5, 2), SUBSTR(t.input_time, 7, 2), 3 AS type, t.money, t.id, NOW() FROM ( SELECT t1.mer_no, DATE_FORMAT(t1.check_end_time, '%Y%m%d') AS 'input_time', t.money, t.id FROM subsidy_item_new t, subsidy_new t1 WHERE t.main_id = t1.id AND date_format(t1.check_end_time, '%Y%m%d') = DATE_FORMAT(curdate(), '%Y%m%d') ) t, hnbt.pay_mer_no t1 WHERE t.mer_no = t1.mer_no and t.input_time = date_format(CURDATE(),'%Y%m%d') ;

INSERT INTO `merchart_amount_detail` ( `mer_no`, `dateallstr`, `yearint`, `monthint`, `dateint`, `type`, `actual_amount`, business_id, `create_time` ) SELECT t.mer_no, t.input_time AS dateallStr, LEFT (t.input_time, 4), SUBSTR(t.input_time, 5, 2), SUBSTR(t.input_time, 7, 2), 2 AS type, t.money, t.id, NOW() FROM ( SELECT t1.mer_no, DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(t1.check_end_time,interval -1 day), '%Y%m%d') AS 'input_time', t.money, t.tran_id FROM subsidy_item_new t, subsidy_new t1 WHERE t.main_id = t1.id AND date_format(t1.check_end_time, '%Y%m%d') = DATE_FORMAT(curdate(), '%Y%m%d') ) t, hnbt.pay_mer_no t1 WHERE t.mer_no = t1.mer_no and t.input_time = date_format(CURDATE(),'%Y%m%d') ;

INSERT INTO `merchart_amount_detail` ( `mer_no`, `dateallstr`, `yearint`, `monthint`, `dateint`, `type`, `actual_amount`, `create_time`, business_id ) SELECT t.mer_no, t.input_time AS dateallStr, LEFT (t.input_time, 4), SUBSTR(t.input_time, 5, 2), SUBSTR(t.input_time, 7, 2), 1 AS type, t.balance, NOW(), t.rec_no FROM hnbt.`mer_input` t, hnbt.pay_mer_no t1 WHERE t.mer_no = t1.mer_no AND t1.area_code = '#{area_code}';
